ie.gmit.sw.base

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.base.Calculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Calculate the cosine distance of several CounterMap<Integer> , compare one CounterMap<Integer> against a queue of them, put results on another queue.

    Spawn a CosineCalculator thread for each couple of maps, then put the CosineDistanceResult in the output queue. Results are in future for and when they are reayd can be show.

    Author:
    Jose I. Retamal

      Constructors

      Create Calculator with all parameters needed, after use this constructor object will be ready to run.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void run()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Calculator

        public Calculator(java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.util.concurrent.Future<CounterMap<java.lang.Integer>>> maps,
                  java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.util.concurrent.Future<CosineDistanceResult>> answers,
                  CounterMap<java.lang.Integer> queryFile,
                  int poolSize,
                  CosineCalculatorType cosineType)
        Create Calculator with all parameters needed, after use this constructor object will be ready to run.
        Parameters:
        maps - input query of CounterMap<Integer>
        answers - output query of CosineDistanceResult, calculated results of query file again queue
        queryFile - query file to compare again input queue
        poolSize - size of executor, number of CosineDistanceResult threads that * run at a time
        cosineType - type cosine calculator to use, can be normal or big, normal is faster but can calculate whit smaller amount if shingles.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Take maps from input queue , calculate cosine distance against query file of those. Then place results in result query.

        submit CosineCalculator thread to executor and put results to answers query

        Stops when get PosionCounterMap object in input queue

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
